2:
Listen to the sound of my call, my King and my God,
\q for it is to you that I pray.
\q
3:
Yahweh, in the morning you hear my cry;
\q in the morning I will bring my petition to you and wait expectantly.
6:
You will destroy liars;
\q Yahweh despises violent and deceitful men.
8:
Oh Lord, lead me in your righteousness because of my enemies;
\q make your path straight before me.
10:
Declare them guilty, God;
\q may their schemes be their downfall!
\q Drive them out for their many transgressions,
\q for they have rebelled against you.
12:
For you will bless the righteous, Yahweh;
\q you will surround them with favor as with a shield.
